name: Cerberus
resistance: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil’s Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn’t impede Cerberus' darkvision.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.desc: Cerberus has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
traits.desc: If Cerberus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Cerberus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Multiple Heads
traits.desc: Cerberus has three heads. While it has more than one head, Cerberus has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious. Whenever Cerberus takes 40 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, Cerberus dies.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Cerberus makes three bite attacks and one claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: One of Cerberus’ heads releases a 60-foot cone of flames. Each creature in the area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful saving throw. Each head has its own recharge counter.

legendary.name: Open/Close the Gate
legendary.desc: Cerberus causes the Gate of Hell to open if it is closed, or close if it is open.

legendary.name: Fire Breath (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.desc: Cerberus uses its Fire Breath ability, even if it has not recharged.
